post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
I like it. It's noting super-de-duper like Quake Wars but it's a fun foot soldier MP game.

I'd say out of the two of them, get Quake Wars. If you already have QW then get Brink. Brink = everything people complained about QW: vehicles, not tactical enough, to complex, etc. Brink is the answer.

I love Brinks customization system, nothing else like it. I just wish there were vehicles too.
